Text:
Thank you for this, I appreciate the rips Puma puts up early, but I can't convert those flash files to play on my PS3 or Blackberry for some reason.

This will do nicely.
Like the other one, i'll keep seeding until the new one comes.

New episodes of Ghost Adventures for some reason seems the hardest to get of the ghost shows.  I mean, a GOOD version and not just some webrip.  No idea why.  
Oh, if only I had a TV tuner card for the PC.  
*holiday gift idea hint* *wink wink*

Thanks for the up DoodleBop!

@trialNerror, I'd just like to know your process for ripping these to .avi that's playable on a DVD player.  Thanks for your ups also!

Personally I use ConvertXtoDVD.
Easy to use.  Nice default templates.
6 episodes will fit on one disc.

*nodding* Yup, ConvertXtoDVD is a great little app! Usable by the complete novice yet can be as detailed and full featured as you want to be with it.
Thanks for the up!

Yup, ConvertXtoDVD is a great little app! Lots of features for advanced users yet usable with default settings for the complete novice.
Thanks for the up!
What kind of avi file is this? not even quicktime will play it.
